title: Knife, ca. 1690
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: brass. The blade with lower edge tapering towards the point, plain bolster. Brass ferrule, doubly waisted with a plain octagonal moulding engraved with geometrical pattern. Tapering handle, octagonal in section, mother-of-pearlwith engraved scrolled foliage, rounded top with writhen knob finial of

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

Knife, ca. 1690.
